item.title: Research
item.description: Office Hours My drop-in office hours this semester are Tuesdays and Thursday from 10am-11am in Ballantine Hall 755. I’m back to doing office hours in person unless we arrange in advance to meet over Zoom. If you have a conflict during those times, email me and we can set up an alternative time. Recommendation Letter Policy I am happy to write letters of recommendation for students who meet the following criteria:
